sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-list-item >
    <v-card class="elevation-3 rounded-lg task-card" flat>
      <v-card-body class="m-card">
        <v-card-title>{{ task.title }}</v-card-title>
        <v-card-subtitle>{{ task.description }}</v-card-subtitle>
      </v-card-body>
    </v-card>

  </v-list-item>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'TaskCard',
  props: {
    task: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>






.m-card {
  padding: 14px;
  width: 100%;
}
</style>
